When it evolves, if it succeeds in defending, there is a chance to apply a slowing effect.
Recovers HP while maintaining "Freeze Ball".

[Prerequisite] 
The weapon enhancement level +9 or higher

97100249.text: Essence used to evolve "Ice Spear".\nEvolution reduces the cooldown of "Ice Spear" by 2 seconds.

97100342.text: Cleaves the enemy's shadow, dealing damage and reducing movement speed by 20% for 2 seconds.\nWhen used, you gain the bloody effect that activates the "Explosive Blood" attack for 12 seconds. Blood effect stacks up to 8 times and increases movement speed by 2% per stack.

Basic attack speed +5%, dexterity attack power +2

97100354.text: Hides in the shadows and becomes stealthed for 7 seconds.\nWhile stealth, "Assault" is activated, which attacks by charging a short distance. Incremented.\nAvailable only manually.

97100356.text: Swings a large dagger to inflict aerial effects with a chance and applies additional combo attacks.\nUsed on targets in mid-air or stunned state.
